content.body: the final aim would be to settle any remaining doubts in one or more meetings so that we can get the final green flag

content.body: Haven't seen any doodles in email, plus my day job is overwhelming me right now. I don't understand what their questions are about - this is a customized program for us based on the NVC model and trainer certifications. NVC is a global thing, it's not like we found this system randomly. This method has been specifically requested by delegates in the past so I really don't see why the ExeCom doesn't have enough information to make a decision. The only other things I could provide are this issue https://github.com/tc39/Admin-and-Business/issues/130 and the cnvc.org website.

NVC is a global thing, it's not like we found this system randomly. This method has been specifically requested by delegates in the past so I really don't see why the ExeCom doesn't have enough information to make a decision. The only other things I could provide are this issue https://github.com/tc39/Admin-and-Business/issues/130 and the cnvc.org website.
